title: I cant reconnect to game after forced disconnect
body: Idk what to do this was a free win

replies.body: Literally same thing.  Game crashed and I can't get back in.  I'm glad it isn't just me.  I was afraid I'd get reported for AFK.

well goodbye promos
Edit: forgot im logged in on my smurf on the boards

I dont think my team DC'd tho.  It shows as a defeat on my screen, and my team was bming me for not doing well, so I probably got reported for afk.

Cool.
Same here! I get "Unable to reconnect to the server. Please check your network and attempt to reconnect to your game" error message. I can't get back in the game.
Same  here . Buddy that I queued with has it too.
